name: The Transmission of Chirp (Through the Convolution Range)
name_original: The Transmission of Chirp (Through the Convolution Range)
description:
The Transmission of Chirp
(Through the Convolution Range)

Explore the concept of hiding in plain sight, inspired by the camouflage ideas of World War I. The game is an experimental single button platformer – the SPACE button is all you need.

Instructions Press SPACE to jump.


Indie Game Studio Course Department of Visual Communication Bezalel Academy of Arts & Design Jerusalem
